raw_body: DEVOTTA – GERALDINE GRACE,​ (Retired Teacher),​ dearly beloved wife of the late George Ralph Devotta,​ beloved mother of Sherine,​ Jerome,​ Odile and Sheran,​ grandmother of Harumi,​ Damien,​ Sean,​ Olivia,​ Celine,​ Collin and Shehani. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour for viewing on Saturday 10th February from 9.00 a.m. to 3.00 p.m. Thereafter cortege leaves for burial to Madampitiya Cemetery (Roman Catholic Section),​ Colombo 15.         009310
